document_data.name: Stedd
document_data.mainbody: '''Stedd''' was a provost of [[Taegan Nightwind]]'s academy of fencing in [[Lyrabar]] as of {{yearlink|1373}}.{{cite book/The Rage||12}}
document_data.Description: Stedd was a wiry young man with a premature bald spot.
document_data.Activities: He was one of the four assistant instructors in the academy.
document_data.History: On the night of [[Ches 12]] of the {{yearlinkName|1373}}, Stedd was magically put to sleep. When Taegan was rescuing people from the fire, he had to slap the young provost in order to wake him. On the morning after the fire, Maestro [[Zalan]] was already trying to recruit him as a provost, to Taegan's concern.
